meanings.definition: To oppress or harass with ill-treatment, especially because of race, religion, or beliefs.
meanings.sent1: The cruel ruler persecutes those who have different beliefs.
meanings.sent2: The government persecutes people for their religious views.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat persecutes the poor mouse in a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: The dark clouds seem to persecute the small town with relentless rain.
meanings.sent5: The haunting memories of war persecute the veteran's dreams every night.

meanings.definition: To pursue with harassing or oppressive treatment.
meanings.sent1: The relentless paparazzi persecutes the famous actor wherever he goes.
meanings.sent2: The bully persecutes the smaller kids on the playground.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel persecutes the birds by stealing their food.
meanings.sent4: The loud noise of the construction site seems to persecute the peaceful neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The constant ringing of the phone persecutes her during important meetings.
